data.title: Denmark's Queen Margrethe II announces abdication on live TV – video
data.meta_description: The Danish queen has unexpectedly announced her decision to step down from the throne on 14 January, exactly 52 years since her ascension in 1972. She made the announcement during her annual New Year's Eve speech. Her eldest son, Crown Prince Frederik, will succeed her
data.text:
This article is more than 7 months old

The Danish queen has unexpectedly announced her decision to step down from the throne on 14 January, exactly 52 years since her ascension in 1972. She made the announcement during her annual New Year's Eve speech. Her eldest son, Crown Prince Frederik, will succeed her

Queen Margrethe II of Denmark announces surprise abdication
